data.text: All you angels who belong to him, praise him!
Sun and moon, you also praise him!
I want all of these to praise Yahweh [MTY]
He determined the places where they should be in the sky,
And everything on the earth, praise Yahweh!
and fire and hail, and snow and frost,
all the wild animals and all you cattle,
You kings on this earth and all the people that you rule,
you young men and young women,
I want them all to praise Yahweh [MTY]
He caused us, his people, to be strong
